Content:
I currently have a 7 year old schuberth c3 and it’s time to get something new. I want to keep things under $300 and want a full face, not a modular. I’ve narrowed my choices down some and want to hear some opinions from owners who have used them. I’m split between a scorpion t520, scorpion covert fx, and a scorpion 1400. The 1400 is from Chromeburners so I’m hesitant to order it since it’s outside the US.

price comparison- t520 $170
covert fix $212
1400 $201

Thoughts and opinions welcome
Title: Looking to buy a new helmet, help please
Author: drewplatt
